entityId.localType: Northern Territory Archives Service Item Number

nameEntry.part: Foster Homes-Proposed Establishment in the Northern Territory

biogHist.abstract: Foster Homes - Proposed Establishment in the Northern Territory is an archival file containing correspondence between the Director of the Welfare Branch of the Northern Territory Administration and the Director of the Tasmanian Social Welfare Department. It contains information about receiving homes in Tasmania.
biogHist.p: Most government records are open for research 30 years after the records were created. Some records may be subject to restrictions due to their sensitive or confidential nature.

Access to non-government and personal records is subject to conditions placed on material by the organisation or person depositing the records. The majority are open access, some require written permission from the depositor.
Please contact the Archives for information about how to apply for access to closed records. A number of Fact Sheets for researchers are available on the Archives website.
